item.description:
Sponsored by Elm City Cycling, in conjunction with the Festival of Arts and Ideas , Melissa VanTine and Laura Burrone will be leading a group of bicycle riders to various Community Gardens and the Long Wharf Nature Preserve which are managed by the New Haven Land Trust. Map of Bike Ride

The trip will begin at 2:00 on the corner of Chapel and College Street end at the Williams Street Community Garden around 4:30 where there will be a cookout and live music from Michael Mills of Drums not Guns.

Free event...Bring money for ice cream.
IMPORTANT: BRING A HELMET! (I can't let you ride without one...sorry)

New Haven Land Trust
Elm City Cycling
Arts and Ideas Festival
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a blue helmet and have a silver bike
item.name: Arts & Ideas Bike Tour of New Haven Land Trust Community Gardens and Preserves
